alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 06 at 7:11PM PST until December 07 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Strongest in and below passes and canyons. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
